panels.description: Number of GET requests each second

targets.expr: count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "method=GET" [1s])

panels.title: All GET Requests per Second

panels.description: Number of POST requests each second

targets.expr: count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "method=POST" [1s])

panels.title: All POST Requests per Second

panels.description: Number of GET requests to /api/v0/requests each second

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 500 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/requests" | logfmt | method="GET" and status >= 500 [1s]))

panels.title: /api/v0/requests GET Requests per Second

panels.description: Number of POST requests to /api/v0/requests each second

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 500 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/requests" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 500 [1s]))

panels.title: /api/v0/requests POST Requests per Second

panels.description: Ethereum balance of anchor service wallet in gwei

targets.expr: sum_over_time({job="cas/metrics"} |= "walletBalance" | logfmt | unwrap balance [1s])

panels.title: ETH Balance in Gwei

panels.description: Number of POST requests to /api/v0/requests each second

targets.expr: sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (ip) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 500 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} |= "/api/v0/anchors" | logfmt | method="POST" and status >= 500 [1s]))

panels.title: /api/v0/requests POST Requests per Second

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/events"} |= "service=db" | logfmt [1s]))
{job="cas/events"} |= "service=db" | logfmt
